name: part_005
file: tmp_【#常闇トワ生誕祭2024】ｰ COLORFUL ｰ【3DLIVE】 [C-QdqYjdArM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Kagiri naku Haiiro e' continues.
Instrumental break and transition between songs.
Performance of the song 'Shiroi Yuki no Princess wa'.

subtitles.original: 失くしてしまったのアイロニー この才能なんて光り物
subtitles.english: The irony of what I've lost, this talent is just a shiny thing

subtitles.original: まだ十全終わってないから 諦めんなって誰かの声
subtitles.english: It's not completely over yet, "don't give up" says someone's voice

subtitles.original: 見失ってしまったのアイロニー 気付いてないふり笑ってる
subtitles.english: The irony of what I've lost sight of, pretending not to notice and laughing

subtitles.original: この感情奪い去ってよ 泥濘になってしまう前に
subtitles.english: Take away these emotions, before they turn into a quagmire

subtitles.original: 私だけ見て愛を伝えて
subtitles.english: Look only at me and convey your love

subtitles.original: この世界とバイバイバイ
subtitles.english: Say bye-bye-bye to this world

subtitles.original: 息も想いも滞って描いた
subtitles.english: Breath and feelings stagnated as I drew

subtitles.original: 夢の形笑っていた
subtitles.english: The shape of my dreams was laughing

subtitles.original: 鏡よ鏡よ鏡さん 世界で一番可愛いのは
subtitles.english: Mirror, mirror, oh mirror, who's the cutest in the world?

subtitles.original: やめてよ 棘のような視線刺さる
subtitles.english: Stop it, those thorn-like gazes pierce through me

subtitles.original: 優しいふりした彼女が 素敵な晩餐もてなした
subtitles.english: She, pretending to be kind, served a wonderful dinner

subtitles.original: そっと口に含ませた 微笑
subtitles.english: She softly put a smile into my mouth

subtitles.original: 薄れゆく意識の真ん中で
subtitles.english: In the middle of my fading consciousness

subtitles.original: 夢を見てる いつかの おとぎ話
subtitles.english: I'm dreaming of a fairy tale from sometime

subtitles.original: 時が止まる
subtitles.english: Time stops

subtitles.original: お願いキスで目を醒ましてほしいの
subtitles.english: Please, I want you to wake me up with a kiss

subtitles.original: 白い棺桶から 連れ出すように
subtitles.english: As if taking me out from the white coffin

subtitles.original: 突き刺さる憎しみはドラマティックな事情
subtitles.english: The piercing hatred is a dramatic circumstance

subtitles.original: 彩っても 君はまだ来ない
subtitles.english: Even if decorated, you haven't come yet

subtitles.original: 鏡よ鏡よ鏡さん 寝癖ネクタイ、微笑みさえ
subtitles.english: Mirror, mirror, oh mirror, even my bedhead, tie, and smile

subtitles.original: 作るから 妬みを 買われてしまった?
subtitles.english: I create them, so did I buy envy?

subtitles.original: 七つの小人はいるけど お助けそぶり知らんぷり
subtitles.english: There are seven dwarfs, but they pretend not to help

subtitles.original: そっと 首を掴まれ 微笑
subtitles.english: Softly, my neck was grabbed, a smile

subtitles.original: 一粒の涙さえも
subtitles.english: Even a single tear

subtitles.original: 拭えなくて 呼吸も ままならない
subtitles.english: Can't be wiped away, I can't even breathe properly

subtitles.original: 視界 伏せた
subtitles.english: Lowered my gaze

subtitles.original: 消えそうだから 早く駆けてほしいの
subtitles.english: Because I'm about to disappear, I want you to run fast

subtitles.original: 訳は訊かないで 答えられない
subtitles.english: Don't ask why, I can't answer

subtitles.original: 望まない憎まれは深い愛の事情
subtitles.english: Unwanted hatred is a matter of deep love

subtitles.original: もうすぐで いなくなるのかな?
subtitles.english: I wonder if I'll be gone soon?

subtitles.original: 途切れてく命の灯
subtitles.english: The light of life that is cutting out

subtitles.original: 毒リンゴを食した 少女のように
subtitles.english: Like the girl who ate the poison apple

subtitles.original: 眠りに就く
subtitles.english: Falling asleep
